Jeremy Carter - Product Design

Interests:

Art Music Design Entrepreneurship Education

Background:

I am an artist, designer and business strategist. I thrive in creative environments that value innovative ideas and artistic integrity. My formal education includes an Industrial Design MFA from the Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD), a Sound Design BFA from the School of the Art Institute of Chicago (SAIC), and a Luthier's Certificate from the Totnes School of Guitar Making. In addition, I am an active artist and musician, having performed and displayed my work in numerous venues, galleries and museums across the US. In 2004, I started my own guitar building business, Carter Custom Instruments and have been fortunate to work with a variety of popular professional musicians.
